mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SELLER_ASK (ask_num, memberIdx, ProductCode, subject, content, category, ASKDATE, answer_state ) VALUES (SELLER_ASK_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberIdx}, #{productCode}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{category}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.select:
select subject, content, category, answer_state as answerState, s.memberIdx as memberIdx, s.productcode as productCode, p.ITEM as productName, s1.BRANDNAME as brandName, askdate as askDate, answer_state as answerState, answer_content as answerContent, answer_date as answerDate from SELLER_ASK s LEFT JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRODUCTCODE = s.PRODUCTCODE LEFT JOIN SELLER_BRAND s1 ON p.BRAND_CODE = s1.BRAND_CODE where s.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
offset #{offset} rows fetch first #{size} rows only
